revised_title: The Fossil Plants of the Coal-Measures: Organization of Lycopodiace
tldr: The author examines the organization and growth stages of fossil plants from the coal-measures, specifically focusing on Lycopodiaceae plants. Through detailed analysis of various sections and specimens, the author establishes the relationship between Lepidodendra and Diploxylon stems, as well as the role of Lepidostrobi in the same plant.
